content.eamr: ( ing-0 "10 hot dogs, cut into thirds" )
( ing-1 "15 slices bacon, cut in half" )

content.text: 0) Wrap 1/2 slice of bacon around each piece of hot dog.
1) Secure the bacon with a toothpick.
2) Place hot dogs into a slow cooker on low heat.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Place"@-1:-1 / AC
		:ppt ( "hot dogs"@-1:-1 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-2-0 "a slow cooker"@23:36 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-2-0 "low heat"@40:48 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Pour brown sugar over hot dogs, let cook for 5 to 6 hours; until the bacon is cooked.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Pour"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-2 "brown sugar"@8:19 / FOOD )
		:gol ( "hot dogs"@25:33 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-3-1 "cook"@39:43 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:duration ( dur-3-0 "5 to 6 hours"@48:60 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-3-0 "until the bacon is cooked"@62:87 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)
